ygData.subject: Re: Enchant Silver spell rumor
ygData.msgSnippet: The Enchant Silver spell is in the library.  Go into Neriak-3rd Gate. After you pass the Spires of Innoruk and the floating eye waterfall, go through the gate
ygData.messageBody:
The Enchant Silver spell is in the library. Go into Neriak-3rd Gate.
After you pass the Spires of Innoruk and the floating eye waterfall, go
through the gate and take the large opening on the left, it's the
building there.

E

"DeGirolami, Franck" wrote:
>
> From: "DeGirolami, Franck" <degirolami@...>
>
> I've heard an ongoing rumor that the Enchant Silver spell was only sold in
> Neriak...well, I have a dark elf necro level 16 so I know Neriak pretty
> well. I've been all over Neriak in all spellcasting guilds and all the shops
> I could think of that could be somewhat related...nothing..
> Can somebody confirm / deny this rumor and tell me where to get the spell in
> Neriak?
> Thanks,
> Skara
